comment: People should apologize to Johnny Depp. They were very wrong and jumped the gun.
commentable_entity.ask: Tell People Magazine to Print a Retraction and Apology to Johnny Depp
commentable_entity.title: Tell People Magazine to Print a Retraction and Apology to Johnny Depp
commentable_entity.description:
On the cover of the June 13, 2016 issue of People magazine, a photo of Amber Heard was advertised along with an article about the toxicity of the marriage between Heard and Johnny Depp.

Mr. Depp has now proven that since that time, Heard has made untrue and defamatory statements about him, including allegations of physical abuse.

People magazine bares some responsibility in giving credence to Heard’s false allegations. The magazine owes its readers, and foremost Mr. Depp, a printed formal apology and retraction.
commentable_entity.letter_body: People Magazine Needs to Print a Retraction and Apology to Johnny Depp
commentable_entity.display_title: Tell People Magazine to Print a Retraction and Apology to Johnny Depp
commentable_entity.petition_title: Tell People Magazine to Print a Retraction and Apology to Johnny Depp

comment: This magazine cover had a big impact on people's opinion of Johnny Depp and it was never proven at this point, it was all apart of her plot to ruin him and she was definitely getting away with it for a long time. Extremely unfair, disgraceful and frustrating  it was handled this way. Now that the truth has come to light they truly do need to do a retraction and apologize to Johnny Depp

comment: People magazine did the opposite of what our laws declare about us as Americans; Innocent UNTIL PROVEN guilty! There was absolutely no investigation on these false claims before spewing them to the world. And I’m doing so, destroyed an outstanding citizen of America; the Land of the Free

comment: I'm signing because the verdict is in, and given that AH was caught in many lies and manufactured (photo-shopped) evidence, the record needs to be set straight.  She used outlets to abuse her then husband, and continues to do so today.  Set the record straight as you have valid proof that her pictures were doctored.
